attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: and allow the people of Salford to elect a representative who doesn't swindle the Inland Revenue out of money. After all MP's should set an example.

rejection.details: Hazel Blears resigned her Cabinet post on 3 June 2009. If you are calling for her to be deselected by the Labour Party, that is a party matter and you should contact the party.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
